input: Air is taken through the mouth Enters the lungs The oxygen fills the sacs in your lungs Carbon dioxide is removed from the lungs and exhaled The oxygen is pass throughout your body.suppose there is no lungs in the body happens, how will it affect lung is cleaned of all the carbon dioxide.

Suns heat enters atmosphere Green house gases enter from the earth Heat is trapped in atmosphere Different things on earth are hotter The overall planet is hotter.suppose "The planets heat will increase" happens, how will it affect LESS global warming.

A type of coal must be chosen before the heating can start The coal is broken down to a smaller material The coal particles mix with hot air and move in to a boiler Water in the boiler is pumped and produces steam with the coal Steam powers turbine blades, which magnetically charge wire coals The water returns back in to its chamber and the process is repeatedsuppose the house is heated happens, how will it affect LESS heat for the house.

Water flows into the dishwasher The dishwasher heats the water The detergent dispenser opens at the right time Water is shot through the jets to clean the dishes The dirty water is drained More water is sprayed to rinse the dishes The water is drained again The air is heated in the dishwasher to dry the dishes.suppose it is been very wet happens, how will it affect HELPING the dishwasher to clean better.

Forest fires burn forests The animals living in the forest have fewer places to hide Predators can now find their prey eaiser Birds will fly away from the area Waters warm up which hurts the fish swimming in them.suppose people are more responsible about putting out their campfires happens, how will it affect less birds will fly away.

Coal is burned Sulfur in the coal combines with oxygen to form sulfur oxides The sulfur oxides are released into the atmosphere The sulfides combine with oxygen in the atmosphere to form sulfur trioxide The sulfur trioxide reacts with water in the atmosphere to form sulfuric acid, a very strong acid The sulfuric acid makes the rain acidicsuppose less liver work available happens, how will it affect MORE acid rain.

Put the aluminum can into a recycle bin The cans are transported to a facility The cans are shredded by a machine The cans are heated to 1400 degrees to melt them The molten metal is poured into molds The molds are flattened and rolled into sheets to reuse.suppose the facility is downsizing happens, how will it affect more cans will be shredded.

A plant grows near or on a rock The plant roots begin to grow Break apart the rock The plant acids dissolve parts of the rock The rocks are broken into more and more pieces Erosion starts to occur.suppose there is not much fuel happens, how will it affect LESS or SLOWER weathering occurring.
